Lance & Lea's Wedding by the Sea

Wedding: March 9th 2019

RSVP: February 8th 2019

Lance and Lea are getting married by the sea!


We cant wait for this day and for our friends and family to join us in celebration.

Below you will find a map to the venue and a timeline of events for the day.

We have also included a couple of our favourite recipes for you to enjoy.

On the day you will be able to tag your instagram photo's with #LanceLeaByTheSea, all tagged photos will be displayed in a gallery here for a full collection of wedding memories!

Lots of love from Lance and Lea!


The IMPORTNAT stuff
Please remember to RSVP at the bottom of the page by the 8th of February

Dress Code
Fun, comfortable and sexy: if you can wear it on the beach and dance in it then you can wear it to the wedding.

About Us

Lance Scarrott - Groom

Recipe for a Lance

3 cups of patience
350g of affection
1 tablespoon curiosity
2 teaspoons dried wit
a pinch of charm

- put the affection in a saucepan and heat until warm and melts your heart

- slowly combine patience, curiosity and dried wit and mix until mixture turns into a smooth batter

- pour into a male shaped bread tin

- bake until golden

- can be served with or without pants

Recipe for a Lea

2 cups of pure energy
250g of love
1 large cute smile
2 teaspoons cartwheels
a dash of pragmatism

- mix energy and love in a large bowl until smooth

- fold in other ingredients until well combined

- take mixture and pour into a fun shaped tin

- cook in oven, no need to take out as she will jump out when ready with a pose and yell "TADA!"

- best served with a pokemon cosplay

​

Lea Pobiega - Bride

Recipe for a Lea

2 cups of pure energy
250g of love
1 large cute smile
2 teaspoons cartwheels
a dash of pragmatism

- mix energy and love in a large bowl until smooth

- fold in other ingredients until well combined

- take mixture and pour into a fun shaped tin

- cook in oven, no need to take out as she will jump out when ready with a pose and yell "TADA!"

- best served with a pokemon cosplay
